scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.json && resolve-tspaths -p tsconfig.json && sh ./fix-pkg.sh node/esm module && yarn tsc-esm-fix --tsconfig tsconfig.json " "tsc -p cjs.tsconfig.json && resolve-tspaths -p cjs.tsconfig.json && sh ./fix-pkg.sh node/cjs commonjs "  "tsc -p web.tsconfig.json && resolve-tspaths -p web.tsconfig.json && sh ./fix-pkg.sh web/esm module && yarn tsc-esm-fix --tsconfig web.tsconfig.json " && webpack
